title: Impact
content: Impact: The application makes users feel that Sit&Eat really thinks about how to meet their needs.
quote: A quote from peer comments: 'The app made my summer vacation in Spain so easy and fun for lunch and dinner! Finally I was able to enjoy Mediterranean food. I would definitely use this app as an option for a delicious, quick, and even healthy meal'.

title: What I learned
content: While designing the Sit&Eat application, I learned that the first ideas for the application are only the beginning of the process. Usability studies and peer feedback influenced each iteration of the app designs.
